Binary Exploitation.description:
Welcome to ""The Guard"", where a vigilant sentinel stands between you and victory. Your challenge: outsmart the digital guardian using binary exploitation. But be cautious of its watchful eye and cunning defenses. Will you bypass the guard and claim triumph, or will you falter in your attempt? It's time to prove your mettle.

Remote Instance:

`nc chall.ycfteam.in 32175`
Binary Exploitation.name: The Guard

Cryptography.description: We communicate using two files at YCF for security reasons.
Cryptography.name: Xtreamly ORbital

Cryptography.description:
Just answer me this simple question:
What is 2 x 2 x 2 x 2 = ?

After you get your answer, go ahead and decrypt the cipher I gave you.

The famous cryptographic algorithm devised by Rivest, Adleman and Shamir can become so complicated to crack if manipulated/altered properly. Think you know it so well? Go ahead and try to solve this challenge!

Remote Instance:

`nc chall.ycfteam.in 21720`
Cryptography.name: RAS

Forensics.description:
"In the land of echoes, where whispers roam, A tale of clues, finds its home. Laughter and tears, merge in the air, In echoes' parody, stories flare.
Footsteps of past, meet those of now, In the echo's chamber, they take a bow. Love's sweet whispers, pain's bitter cry, All in the echoes, they do lie.
Listen close, and you will find, Clues and whispers, intertwined. In the echo's game, secrets unfurl, A world of mysteries, for all to swirl."

Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GPdculNuobTkrOPRX898Z69_WkPDWEUi/view
Forensics.name: Echos Parody

Web Security.description:
Legends tell of a hidden castle guarded by a peculiar locksmith.
 Craft the perfect yarn and unlock the secrets within! (P.S. He seems to have a lot to say about overly long stories...)
 
` http://chall.ycfteam.in:5551/login.html`
Web Security.name: The Loquacious Locksmith

Web Security.description:
Dive into the heart of our virtual fortress and test your prowess by gaining access to the hidden chamber. The challenge awaits those brave enough to navigate through cunningly crafted defenses. Unravel the secret concealed within and unlock the pathway to exclusive privileges. Do you have what it takes to breach the fortified wall and claim your place among the elite?

Access the Website here:

`http://chall.ycfteam.in:7550/`
Web Security.name: Access Denied

Web Security.description:

Web Security.description:
Admin's malfunctioning login system seems obsessed with monologues! It craves a long speech, but whispers of a hidden treasure (perhaps a /flag) lie beyond.  Can you appease the machine's theatrical desires and claim the reward? Remember, the best performances leave the audience wanting more...

`http://chall.ycfteam.in:5552/login.html`
